speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Can I get your name for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Alex. You have a balance of $250 due on your account. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I didn't realize I had a balance. Can you give me more details?

speaker: Agent
text: Certainly! The last payment was made in July, and the current balance includes late fees.

speaker: Customer
text: I see, but I need to check my records before making a payment.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! Would you like to discuss a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I think that would be best. I need a little more time.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. We can set up a plan for you. When do you think you could make the first payment?

speaker: Customer
text: Maybe next week. I'll check my schedule.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. Please don't hesitate to call us back if you have any questions.

speaker: Customer
text: Thanks for your help, Mark. I appreciate it.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Alex! Have a great day!
